actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit certain multiyear pension plan distributions to be treated as qualifying rollover distributions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit distributions from a tax-qualified deferred compensation plan which are made after the close of the taxable year but before the tax return filing date to be treated as being made on the last day of such taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit certain multiyear pension plan distributions to be treated as qualifying rollover distributions.
